scripts-UNUSED.init-publish-submodule-UNUSED: echo --Install publish submodule /posix commands used/-- && sh ./utils/publish-init.sh
scripts-UNUSED.test-all-UNUSED: echo --Run all lint & test tasks-- && npm-run-all eslint type-check test && echo --All tests passed--
scripts-UNUSED.check-all-UNUSED: echo --Run all pre-commit check-ups-- && npm-run-all prettier stylelint eslint type-check && echo --All check-ups passed--

scripts.gulp-assets-update: echo --Run gulp assets update task-- && npx gulp updateAll
scripts.gulp-assets-watcher: echo --Start gulp assets watcher task-- && npx gulp watchAll
scripts.clear-assets: echo --Clear generated assets-- && rimraf -g -v static/blocks/**/* static/generated-assets/**/* static/generated-assets/**/.*
scripts.recreate-assets: echo --Recreate generated assets-- && npm-run-all clear-assets update-assets
scripts.livereload-assets-server: echo --Start livereload server-- && python manage.py livereload static
scripts.start-django: echo --Start django dev server-- && python manage.py runserver 8080
scripts.check-all: echo --Run all python checkers /autopep8, venv/-- && npm-run-all pyformat pylint
scripts.help: echo --List all available script commands-- && npm-package-user-scripts-list
